title: Bad microphone quality using usb-c headphone jack
content:
When I use a headphone with ausb-c adapter the microphone quality is really bad. While calling and recording speech messages in whatsapp the input of the microphone is quiet and band passed( less high and low frequencies) 

I used 2 adapters from a noname company and one from Samsung.
I also used 2 different headphones

Do I have to use the Google headphone jack?

Best regards 
Christoph
